website_summaries.verdict: An extremely emollient moisturizer for the driest of skin.
pros: Ideal for those with eczema, psoriasis, or with redness or roughness caused by medications
Extremely moisturizing and forms a protective layer
Directions state to gently pat off any moisturizer that remains 2 minutes after applying
cons: Must use very sparingly and some say it doesn't absorb very well

customer_reviews.title: Just a fancy Vaseline
customer_reviews.text: I used EltaMD intense moisturizer on my face, even though I noticed it had a texture like watered down Vaseline, used it for 3 nights in a row and it just did what was expected from a "moisturizer" that has only 2 ingredients, petrolatum and paraffin. Very oily feel on the skin, will keep it in case I get a minor burn but not putting it on my face again, really disliked the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ileana

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer for Eczema
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite moisturizer and my first five star review. I was using Aveeno's Ultra Calming moisturizer before and have switched to EltaMD. So happy I made the switch! For those with Eczema, I'm happy to report that EltaMD doesn't burn and it heals any dry rough patches. It's soothing and comes out as an ointment-like texture that MELTS into your face. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Scronce

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer that does not feel greasy. I put this on at night after my Elta MD PM Moisturizer and this keeps me moisturized all night long. My dermatologist said put this on since your face comes in contact with the pillow all night and wicks up moisture. This helps so much. In the morning, it washes off very easily and no traces are left behind. Very water soluble.
customer_reviews.author: Pausing

customer_reviews.title: Bummer!
customer_reviews.text: Very hydrating product. Used this for a facial moisturizer and my face flared up with redness. At least there are only 2 ingredients, so I know one of them is the irritant! Bummed cause I wanted to love this due to my very dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Halle

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I was terrified to put Vaseline/wax on my face, but my Curology rep suggested this moisturizer and I have really enjoyed it. I normally have oily skin, but since I’m using some intense topicals to battle adult acne, I needed something a little more occlusive at night to seal in the skincare/moisturizer I’m using. This in combination with prescription retinol and Neutrogena Hydro Boost lotion has been a lifesaver for my skin. I was peeling before, and now my skin is soft and smooth. No breakouts on my super sensitive and acne-prone skin!
customer_reviews.author: e_whospends_money

customer_reviews.title: Love EltaMD
customer_reviews.text: I love all the other EltaMD products I have tried.... except this one 😕 this “mosturizer” is petroleum jelly.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I am using a retinol product (to treat hormonal acne) which dries out my skin and I use this on my face at night time with EltaMD barrier renewal complex and my skin feels so much better, much more moisturized. The texture like a non sticky super lite vaseline. Works great as body lotion too.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dry, sensitive skin, and peeling due to Retin-A use
customer_reviews.text: I have to apply prescription Retin-A and Hydroquinone for treatment of melasma. These creams are hard on my face. They cause redness, burning, sensitivity, and extreme dryness and peeling. I’ve tried nearly every expensive brand of moisturizer you can think of from Sephora and Ulta. Then I tried this moisturizer... and I’m so glad I did!! Works far better than my high-end name brand moisturizers. Have to use Retin-A and can’t find a moisturizer that will help with the peeling? Try this one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Wells

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing moisture. I live in a climate that is very dry. I have tried everything and nothing compares to this. It is a little greasy when it first goes on but it is quickly absorbed into my skin. I use it on my face every morning and night and on my hands as well. I even rub it into my nails to keep them from drying out and cracking. I love, love love this product by Elta. I have tried many of their products and all are great but this one is an absolute must have!
customer_reviews.author: mysticelder

customer_reviews.title: Seems like expired product
customer_reviews.text: The product when it came out of the tube feels pretty good. I am not sure if this is an old product since there is no expiration date it is hard to tell. The product was solidified and would not come out; I was already squeezing so hard and even soaked the tube in warm water thinking that would help. It did not. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lakota

customer_reviews.title: It's fancy Vaseline, take it or leave it
customer_reviews.text: This has 2 ingredients, petrolatum (Vaseline) and paraffin. It is like a watered down Vaseline so it's not as thick. Instructions say to wipe off the layer after you put it on, I don't. I prefer to have the layer there to protect against wind and dryness. Sure, Vaseline is cheaper but also very thick. So it depends on what you want. I am glad I tried it but not sure I will buy it again. Seems like I could just buy and mix paraffin wax and Vaseline together and get the same thing for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Winter must have!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you are prone to dry skin or are on Accutane.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel oily. Have to put on twice daily.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 10 days now and it’s okay. It was recommended to me by my my facialist because it only contains two ingredients. I don’t like to use product with lots of ingredients that I can’t even pronounce thinking they might be harmful. This product does not mosturize my skin as good as my last moisturizer and sometimes I have to apply it twice a day and I do not have super dry skin but I like that it only has those two ingredients. It does not leave my skin feeling oily like other products.
customer_reviews.author: bes

customer_reviews.title: Buy in jar
customer_reviews.text: I combine this product with Tata Harper’s nutrient face oil and apply 3-4 nights a week living in a dry climate. Love this combination. I rub a bit of TH oil on my palm and then add a pea size squirt of Elta. Pressing gently on my face. Works wonders for my sensitive skin. HOWEVER, what ruins it is when a watery liquid squirts out instead because it somehow separated from the petroleum. Not cool. I’ve tried storing in various positions, shaking, etc. but it’s unpredictable - and only happens about 1 in 5 applications. But I also just noticed a jar version so sweet - try that.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, greasy doesn't penetrate well. I have awful dry eastern European and northern Italian skin. I was hoping my skin would drink it up but it really just a layer that floats on top. For nighttime / bedtime applications its fine. Has it helped with healing to prevent scarring, maybe.....
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O Wexler

customer_reviews.title: Great for laser or burn treatments
customer_reviews.text: I am currently in a study for a new handpiece for radio frequency. It calls for the use of aquafor or elta md. And hands down I prefer this elta md product. It is lighter and not quite as greasy. It is still annoying to be greased up all day and I would not use it as a daily moisturizer but it does it’s purpose the first few days of recovery. I also love the elta md laser gel to help cool along with this moisturizer to keep it moisturized through the day and night
customer_reviews.author: Sandra T

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive, acne-prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, combination skin that doesn't seem to cooperate with most products. I needed something that would moisturize my dry spots while not making my skin more congested than it already is. I purchased this moisturizer after reading a recommendation in a blog post, and I'm really pleased with it! Very moisturizing, no sting, and after blotting (which they suggest) it gives my face a nice, natural glow. I use it daily under BB cream and nightly after glycolic treatments, and it really soothes my skin. I'll definitely be purchasing again when I run out, which won't be anytime soon - a little goes a long way with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Imani B

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions carefully!
customer_reviews.text: Before trying out this product for myself, I noticed a lot of people were complaining about its vaseline-like consistency. The instructions say that you have to use a VERY LITTLE amount, like smaller than a pea. The stuff is super concentrated!! I find that applying a tiny amount while your face is wet helps to absorb the “greasiness.” After a few minutes of drying my face felt really soft without any sticky/greasy/etc residue from the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dabao Family

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this moisturizer. It's the best
customer_reviews.text: I first got this product from my dermatologist but since have ordered a dozen or more from Amazon. The price is the same. My skin is very dry and I love the way this melting moisturizer feels andcworks. It's not greezy and it doesn't stain my pillows etc. I have a sense of panic when I'm amost out. It's great to mix with retinol creams if too strong too.
customer_reviews.author: V Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Use with retin a
customer_reviews.text: Recommended this product by a dermatologist bc of dry retin a skin. I mix it in with my regular moisturizer on damp skin. It works well and doesnt make me break out. I like how it makes me look glowy but you can always pat dry with a towel after it absorbs a bit.
customer_reviews.author: magor

customer_reviews.title: HELPS WITH DRY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after it was recommended for use after a chemical peel. It's very hydrating and definitely helps with dry skin. It is like petroleum jelly, so be careful with adding too much before putting on makeup; your face will feel very oily. I put on a very small quantity, wait a few minutes and blot off the excess before putting on my makeup. I would recommend for anyone with very dry skin or for sun burn.
customer_reviews.author: Tita

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my skin moisturized and happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, non-clogging, deep moisture for your skin. I have sensitive skin, am acne-prone, and live in a very dry environment. This helps keep my skin moisturized without clogging my pores. Very happy! It definitely goes on thick and will feel sticky for a while after application...so not a good moisturizer if you're looking to top with makeup right away.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever used
customer_reviews.text: I was given this after a facial laser treatment. I loved the way it felt and remained on my face. The directions say to wipe off after a few minutes but I did not. I just continued to rub it in over time. I even ditched my night moisturizer for this. I also use it on any dry cracked areas. I healed my cracked thumb in only 2-3 days with continued applications. Not kidding! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this product
customer_reviews.text: I use it at night, and it seems like a really thin Vasoline that "melts" as you rub it in to face. It seems to clog my pores somewhat; it is not what I expected from this brand because I use the tinted sunscreen and it is outstanding. I will not buy it again, I think there are better moisturizers for night time that work better.
customer_reviews.author: NormaBates

customer_reviews.title: BEST moisturizer EVER
customer_reviews.text: be warned, this stuff IS oily, BUT that is absolutely no issue for me. When I was on Accutane (very harsh acne medication), my dermatologist recommended this for my patchy, dry, flaky skin and it did WONDERS. I usually put it on my skin like a face mask (a little goes a very long way) and leave it on for 20 minutes to an hour rubbing it in occasionally. Made my skin texture even, my face smooth... everything you'd want in a moisturizer. This sounds like an ad and I wish it were, but this product is amazing. End of story.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be a sucker like I was, this is just Vaseline.
customer_reviews.text: This is just vaseline. I feel like such a sucker and betrayed by the Elta brand. You can save a ton of money and just go buy Vaseline for a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Plain tx guy

customer_reviews.title: Great intense moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it's a little like ointment. But it has really helped when my skin gets dry and flaky Edit: doesn't work as great as I thought, sometimes it absorbs into my skin and sometimes it doesn't, I still have dry patches on my cheeks even though I use it every night
customer_reviews.author: Alicen Mockler

customer_reviews.title: People...it's Vaseline
customer_reviews.text: I do not get the hype with this, nor did I get the results others seem to have. What I *did* get was a mild allergic reaction just like I get with Vaseline...because it is, in fact, Vaseline. Petroleum jelly alone does not a moisturizer make. It can be an irritant for some people. Your mileage may vary. Not a good value or a product I'll use anywhere but on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Dallas

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Was told by plastic surgeons office to apply this stuff to my stomach after a laser stretch mark removal procedure. The consistency is like aquaphor but thicker. It works great for post laser care. I also use Retin-a on my face and this stuff is great to put on at night with that. I would not put it on in the morning personally because it’s so thick it doesn’t ever absorb enough into my skin so I would go to work and everyone would be able to see the shiny goop on my skin. 5 stars for hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use this is you are using Retin-A
customer_reviews.text: If you use retin-a on your face and/or neck, this is a fabulous moisturizer to counter balance the dryness that the retin-a causes. So many moisturizers either burn or don't hydrate enough but this one is fantastic. If you are just starting out with retin-a you can mix it with this to ease your skin into using the retin-a.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great, super hydrating moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful. I live in Colorado and it's super hydrating, but somehow it is not greasy either. I am acne-prone and this has never caused a breakout for me, while many other products (especially thick moisturizers) do. You only need a small amount for it to work well. I use it before bed.
customer_reviews.author: BlaireTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I use it before going outside in the cold
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly when I go outside (and put it on hubby, too) to prevent chapping. A bit thick and "greasy" for under makeup. It really is, basically, Vaseline, but in a nicer format. Still, I'm on my second tube because it's good for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Bee

customer_reviews.title: Watery consistency-will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years. This is the first time I have purchased the tubes though. I will never do it again. It has always been a firm consistency. But these tubes are like using a watery oil. I cannot believe it is a valid Elta MD product as I have never had this problem before and am incredibly disappointed in both of the tubes that I bought. Something is just not right here...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It only takes a pea amount for an application. I have sensitive skin and have not experienced any breakouts or problems. I highly recommend this product and plan to order more products for skin treatment.
customer_reviews.author: simple simeon

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on the recommendation of my Dr.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for use after a C02 Laser procedure. Application 3-4x daily after skin cleansing and I have to say it worked very well. I will continue to use this product as needed for a nighttime moisturizing product. On the plus side after using this 3-4x daily for a week my cuticles look amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: R Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Oil in a tube
customer_reviews.text: I used this for awhile but got tired of having to mix it up in the tube before dispensing hoping i didnt just get a blob of oil. That's what you get most of the time, dripping oil. I threw it out
customer_reviews.author: Beaner

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t break me out like other products I have sensitive skin. My dermatologist recommendation to get this for after micro needling for super dry sensitive skin. It really is a great purchase. Again so surprised at the price being so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Snazzi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and in cold weather I struggle with dryness. I tried this moisturizer not expecting to receive much positive results. My skin now looks and feels softer. My under eye bags are amazingly smooth and eye wrinkles are softer. My skin now has a healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: Brianwalking

customer_reviews.title: For night use
customer_reviews.text: The product does a good job of moisturizing, but would be too heavy to use in the daytime. I don't think the product info says it is a night-time moisturizer, but that is my take.
customer_reviews.author: C. J.

customer_reviews.title: Locks In Hydration
customer_reviews.text: This works well on my sensitive mature skin to lock in my serum and moisturizer at night. It does have paraffin and petroleum in it, I’ve always found paraffin to be effective in locking in hydration. Living in a dry SW climate this is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: H.B.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t for me
customer_reviews.text: I’m not fond of this but in fairness, I have auto immune diseases and terrible allergic reactions to many things. It just didn’t work for me. I do think it was overpriced for what is in it!
customer_reviews.author: elanowolf

customer_reviews.title: Eczema life saver
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter has the worst skin ever. We have battled extreme eczema since she was 6 months old. 5 days ago, we started this lotion (in conjunction with a topical steroid). This is the only lotion she hasn't broken out from. All creams usually go on nicely, but within hours she would have hives or acne. Or, the cream would burn/sting her irritated and scratched skin. This is a life saver. If you're battling eczema, give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Save your money and buy a jar of ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Save your money and buy a jar of Vaseline if that is what you need since there are two ingredients: petroleum and paraffin. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Winter

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: This stuff it too oily. I applied it and left it on overnight. I woke up and my face had a huge rash on it. I have rosacea but I don't know what happened. Amazon has great customer service. Thanks for that!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Banks

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but after a few days of use my face broke out. I believe it has the same ingredient as Aquaphor, which doesn't make me break out, so going back to that. It's also less expensive as well. It was hydrating while I used it though.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great for psoriasis, eczema and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer. It’s a lot like Vaseline but not as heavy so it absorbs better. I use this on my very very very dry skin due to psoriasis. I even use it on my crotch area. TMI, I know, but needs to be said.
customer_reviews.author: BettaE

customer_reviews.title: Lasting hydration!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend with similar acne issues. I'm hypersensitive to most products and was frustrated with products making it worse. This takes away the itching and dry flaky feel so I can focus on my life and not my face. The best ever. I would gladly pay triple for this product.
customer_reviews.author: msreecee37

customer_reviews.title: Elta MD Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I love all Ella MD products due to the quality. I was a little disappointed because I thought this was going to be a lotion (must not of read description completely). Still super hydrating. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: FervidMAB

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not the best moisturizer, probably wouldn’t buy it again. It’s extremely oily, does not set on your face, and will stay oily until you wipe it off with something. I don’t know about you, but I’d prefer it to set on face.
customer_reviews.author: Vitalina

customer_reviews.title: I get compliments all the time on how soft my face looks!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! One tube lasts a long time because I mix just a dab with my morning Elta facial moisturizing facial sunscreen. I use it every night before bed! Love this product. Recommended by my Dermatologist after a laser treatment and continue to use it mixing a little with a face lotion in the morning and at night keeps my face baby soft!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna Staugaard

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I am getting old and my skin which has always been plenty oily is starting to dry out while I sleep despite using Max Roc products before bedtime. I have started to smear a little of this on my face when I get up in the middle of the night for other (old-age related) reasons. My face is looking much better when I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: knoisy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. My dermatologist recommended this for me to use after a procedure to remove pre-cancerous spots on my face. I really moisturizes the skin and literally "melts" when you apply it to your face making it much easier to apply.
customer_reviews.author: LoneEric

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: i have acne prone skin and this has never made me break out. i use tretinoin nightly and this really helps with the dryness that accompanies that. elta has a great line of products. i put this on before bed after all my other products and it kind of seals everything in and helps my dry spots.
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: was hoping for better, quite underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I have combination/sensitive skin and was looking for a daily moisturizer to take care of persistent/flaky dry patches on my face. I have had luck with ointment-like moisturizers (e.g. aquaphor) for eczema on my hands, so this seemed like it would work great for my face. However, it just seemed to be greasy (as expected) without taking care of my dry patches on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I live in Antarctica and this keeps my fave from drying out in the winds. Petroleum texture. Absolutely balling.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorFranson

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: It does help keep your skin from drying out, but it’s very greasy. Even after I pat my skin as instructed on the package, my hair will get feel oily if it touches my face. I’ll still keep it because it doesn’t cause breakouts, but only if use when need intense moisturization.
customer_reviews.author: Littlepup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use in combination with Retin-A
customer_reviews.text: I use Retin-A but struggled due to the drying side effects. I began using this product and now I can use Retin-A daily.
customer_reviews.author: MATT D

customer_reviews.title: Feel moisturized without the grease
customer_reviews.text: I use this at night and it keeps my face feeling moisturized. I don't feel dry and crunchy when I wake up. Not heavy but does the work of a much heavier cream/ointment. Would not recommend for daytime use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Non-irritating and soothing moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is the best of all. I tried baby care and very expensive products of which none worked for me. This one I use at night time and during the day I apply Elta MD UV facial with SPF 30 underneath and my skin is well protected. Both products are not expensive and do not contain any fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ludwig-Parks

customer_reviews.title: Best post-treatment moisture!
customer_reviews.text: Just had a chemical peel and my skin was peeling more than it ever had after a treatment. I ordered this with one day shipping and ABSOLUTELY love it! Best post treatment choice for pure moisture. Would be great for chronic dry skin too.
customer_reviews.author: ggstuart

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: The most effective stuff I have used on my old,abused, photodynamically fried skin. Follow directions...a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Mart

customer_reviews.title: Heal dry skin
customer_reviews.text: My face was dry and scally in some area because of the cold weather. After a couple weeks of use, the dry part is gone. Recommended to heal dry skin. It does melt like butter on your face and a bit greasy. But it works well. I would use this all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - made my skins itchy and red
customer_reviews.text: I have used the EltaMD sunscreen and loved it, but tried this and had a totally different story. My face would sting, itch, and was unbearable. I didn't want to believe it and the consistency is nice, but unfortunately this is not meant for people with sensitive skin. They must have changed one of the ingredients or something. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth, not greasy
customer_reviews.text: It is initially "greasy" feeling when applied but absorbs quickly. I am very dry and have bad allergies and this works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great and now my dry skin doesn't feel like it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema. This stuff works great and now my dry skin doesn't feel like it's on fire. Note though, you'll have to clean your pillow cases more often if you're applying this at night. :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura Reilly

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product for your face
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product for your face. I used to use Vaseline petroleum jelly and this feels alot like that but less thick.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and also use something prescribed by my dermatologist that dries it out even more. I only use this moisturizer at night because it’s oily. When I wake up in the morning it’s soaked in and my skin looks great. I wouldn’t recommend it for the day because it would look too Oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Tougher Skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother; she seems to like it and I have purchased it a few times for her. She let me know that it is a thinner lotion/moisturizer and it is one of her favorites to use. It is my understanding that it is a bit thinner than Burt’s Bee’s, certainly thinner than L’Occitane, and almost has an oily feel, but once rubbed in, causes no issue. She’s about 70 and has a large number of liver spots on the skin and spends a significant amount of time in the sun. Although the tube is small, realistically speaking, it's cheaper than L'Occitane.
customer_reviews.author: College Stealth

customer_reviews.title: Is petroleum. Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Is vaseline. I do not see any improvement in dryness and cannot wear during day or under makeup. very greasy and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Fisch

customer_reviews.title: My doctor uses
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I first got this from my doctor after a CO2 Laser on my face. It has a lot of moisture and if the doctor uses it, it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Julaine

customer_reviews.title: Realllllly moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is more like a vaseline/aquaphor type consistency. I love putting it on my face at night to have it sink in. It's really helped my dry sky.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Your dry skin prayers answered
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!!!! This was the answer to my dry skin prayers! I use this after any strong facial treatments but also nightly before bed. It’s def for those of us with very dry skin .. but I can’t recco this product enough!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: ooh very melty and creamy
customer_reviews.text: Extreme moisturization. Very gelly and oily, I use a small dab on my finger and spread it with water. Reminds me of petroleum jelly
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy because I have super sensitive skin and have been dealing with bad breakouts.. but this product has not seemed to irritate my skin. I’ve been using for a few weeks, really like the way it makes my face feel.

product_meta.title: EltaMD Intense Face and Body Moisturizer for Very Sensitive & Dry Skin, Long-Lasting Moisturizing Lotion, Fragrance-Free, 2.8 oz
product_meta.description:
EltaMD Intense Moisturizer melts on contact and retains 90% of skin’s moisture for at least 12 hours. This sensitivity-free moisturizer absorbs deeply to moisturize and soothe inflamed, irritated, flaky, intact post-procedure skin.

BRAND STORY
EltaMD Skin Care is committed to helping you have great skin for life. Our company has developed sunscreen, skin care products and wound healing products trusted by physicians for more than 25 years.
